response.overview: “God Ji Sermoniser of Geeta” a film dedicated to the true teachings of the most sacred book in hindu mythology the Bhagwad Geeta. The Film showcases the Questions which remain unanswered, illusions of life which misguide people. The Film depicts the true nature of God, the true essence of Bhagwad Geeta which we need to retain, maintain and sustain throughout the world. Sermoniser means preacher, God himself is the preacher of the sacred book Bhagwad Geeta The film is a treat for all the followers of Brahma Kumaris. Find the truth and only the truth in a world cluttered with lies, stress, selfishness and greed.
response.title: Godji Sermonizer Of Geeta
